    • Constructor Detail

      • AccountModel

        public AccountModel(java.lang.String name,
                    int id,
                    int initialBalance)
        This constructor initializes the balance to the value passed. Value passed should be in USD cents.
        Parameters:
        initialBalance - This should be in USD.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if initialBalance < 0

    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        public void deposit(int val)
        Deposits money to account increasing balance
        Parameters:
        val - Amount to deposit.
        currencyCode - The currency the deposit is done in.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if value < 0

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw(int val)
              throws OverdrawException
        Withdraws money from account decreasing balance. Throws exception if withdraw would overdraw account.
        Parameters:
        val - Amount to withdraw.
        currencyCode - The currency the deposit is done in.
        Throws:
        OverdrawException - If about to overdraw, throw this.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if value < 0
